Description: This is a really nice used Yamaha Pacifica 112M. It has an upgraded tortoise shell pickguard and upgraded string saver saddles. Also included is a nicely padded gig bag that is in new condition. I bought this guitar used on ebay a couple years ago because my very first electric guitar was a Yamaha Pacifica and I always enjoyed playing it because of the fantastic neck. I'm not sure about the age of this guitar, but I'm sure it's been around for a while. It has some dings from use and there is some visible fret wear, but everything is fully functional and it plays like a dream with no fret buzz. I added the new pickguard and upgraded the saddles. It had a white pearloid pickguard that matches the back plate when I got it. I will include that pickguard so you can change back if you wish. The trem is currently blocked and there is no trem arm. I had planned on upgrading the pickups when I got it, but these pickups sound fine. This is an easy playing, great sounding and very versatile guitar that won't break the bank. Payment is via PayPal only with shipping via UPS Ground. I will only ship to the lower 48 continental U.S. so, NO INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS, please. Because this item is used it is being sold "as is" with no returns. However, if there is an issue of concern when received, please contact me so I can make it right for you. Thanks for looking...
Title: Yamaha Pacifica 112M with nicely padded gig bag
ConditionDescription: Good condition with some minor dings from use, but fully functional.
